item.title: Katherine add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Be patient toward all that is unsolved in your heart and try to love the questions themselves, like locked rooms and like books that are now written in a very foreign tongue. Do not now seek the answers, which cannot be given you because you would not be able to live them. And the point is, to live everything. Live the questions now. Perhaps you will then gradually, without noticing it, live along some distant day into the answer." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Ah, how good it is to be among people who are reading!" -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Katherine add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "It is not our part to master all the tides of the world, but to do what is in us for the succour of those years wherein we are set, uprooting the evil in the fields that we know, so that those who live after may have clean earth to till. What weather they shall have is not ours to rule." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Katherine add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Pay heed to the tales of old wives. It may well be that they alone keep in memory what it was once needful for the wise to know." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Katherine add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Where there's life there's hope, and need of vittles." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Katherine add a quote by J R R Tolkien
item.description: "The world is full enough of hurts and mischances without wars to multiply them." -- J R R Tolkien

item.title: Katherine add a quote by J. R. R. Tolkien
item.description: "A hunted man sometimes wearies of distrust and longs for friendship." -- J. R. R. Tolkien

item.title: Katherine add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Do not scorn pity that is the gift of a gentle heart, Ã‰owyn!" -- J.R.R. Tolkien
